pkgmetadata.longdescription: related: an R package for analyzing pairwise relatedness data based on codominant molecular markers // Provides functions for calculating relatedness from codominant genetic data using any or all of seven estimators, and includes options for considering inbreeding and genotyping errors, and can estimate 95% confidence intervals. Also includes simulation options for comparing the performance of different estimators on a given data set and estimating the expected resolution given a particular data set.
